document.masterDocTitle: Three new species of Aethes Billberg, 1820 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Cochylini), with a list of the species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new species of Aethes Billberg, 1820 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Cochylini), with a list of the species from China

heading.emphasis:
List of
Aethes
species in China

subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: China (Mt. Baiyun, Song County, Henan). Holotype ( 3 ), paratype ( 2 Ƥ): NKU. Distribution. China (Henan).

Phalonia alatavica Danilevskij, 1962 : 111
. Type locality: Central Asia (Czilik, Zailijskij, Ala Tau). Holotype ( 3 ): ZMAS.
Aethes alatavica (Danilevskij, 1962 )
: Razowski, 1970 : 369 .
Distribution. China (Beijing, Inner Mongolia , Ningxia, Qinghai, Shaanxi, Shanxi, Xinjiang), Russia .

Aethes amurensis Razowski, 1964 : 348
. Type locality: Russia (Amur Region, Blagovesthensk). Holotype ( 3 ): MGAB.
Distribution. China (Beijing, Gansu, Guizhou, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Henan, Jilin, Liaoning, Ningxia, Qinghai, Shaanxi, Shanxi), Korea , Russia .

Phalonia atmospila Meyrick, 1937 : 170
. Type locality: China (Likiang, Yunnan). Holotype (Ƥ): BMNH.
Aethes atmospila (Meyrick, 1937 )
: Razowski, 1970 : 371 .
Distribution. China (Xinjiang, Yunnan).

Aethes bistigmatus Byun
& Li, 2006 : 787 . Type locality: Korea (Mt. Jeombong, Gangweon-do), China (Mt. Changbai, Jilin). Holotype ( 3 ), paratype ( 3 ): KNA .
Distribution. China (Jilin), Korea .

Cochylis cinereoviridana Kennel, 1899 : 29
. Type locality: Central Asia (Namangan). Syntype (s): MNHU.
Aethes cinereoviridana (Kennel, 1899 )
: Razowski, 1970 : 302 .
Distribution. China (Xinjiang), Central Asia.

Aethes citreoflava Kuznetzov, 1966 : 203
. Type locality: Russia (Primorsky Krai, Yakovlevka). Holotype ( 3 ): ZMAS.
Distribution. China (Heilongjiang, Jilin), Japan , Korea , Mongolia , Russia .

Argyrolepia cnicana Westwood, 1854 : 280
. Type locality: Great Britain (Epping and Yaxley Fen). Holotype : BMNH.
Phalonia arcticana Brandt, 1937 : 71
. Type locality: Finland . Holotype (Ƥ): Brandt Collection.
Aethes cnicana (Westwood, 1854 )
: Razowski, 1970 : 309 .
Distribution. China (Beijing, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia , Jilin, Liaoning, Tianjin ), Europe, Japan , Russia .

Aethes delotypa Razowski, 1970 : 361
. Type locality: China (Likiang, Yunnan). Holotype ( 3 ): ZFMK.
Distribution. China (Tibet, Yunnan), Europe.

10 .
Aethes fennicana (Hering, 1924 )
(
Figs. 5
, 9 , 12 )

Lozopera fennicana Hering, 1924 : 77
. Type locality: Finland (Esbo). Syntypes ( 1 3, 1 Ƥ): Unknown.
Lozopera adelaidae Toll, 1955 : 62
. Type locality: Poland (Baligród). Holotype ( 3 ): ISEZ.
Aethes adelaidae (Toll, 1955 )
: Razowski, 1960 : 400 .

Aethes ( Cirriaethes ) fennicana (Hering, 1924 )
: Razowski, 1960 : 342 .

Aethes fennicana (Hering, 1924 )
: Razowski, 1970 : 366 .

Material examined. CHINA :
3 3, 2 Ƥ, Nalati, Xinyuan County ( 40 ° 43 ʹN, 124 ° 46 ʹE), Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, 1562 m ,
6−7 .viii. 2007
, leg. Xinpu Wang (genitalia slide Nos.: SYH 11437 Ƥ, SYH 11440 3 , SYH 11454 Ƥ).
Distribution. China (Xinjiang), Europe.
Note. This species is recorded for the first time in China .
